About Me

I'm a Full-Stack Web Developer with a passion for creative design and problem solving. I have 3+ years of professional experience in all phases of the development process. I believe coding is an artform and I work hard everyday at mastering my craft.
Strategy
I collaborate with clients to transform raw ideas into well thought out designs.
UX/UI
I create websites with intuitive UI patterns and simple interactions.
Responsive
Experienced in creating responsive layouts that look great on all devices.
Code
I focus on writing SOLID code that is efficient, modular and easy to read.

My Projects

Here is a collection of some of my past projects. You can head over to my GitHub if you'd like to see more.
gmaps.js
JavaScript
A JavaScript library that enables the rapid development of robust Google Maps web applications by providing extended functionality with a more streamlined API. View Website
jQuery Geocomplete
JavaScript
A jQuery plugin for the Google Maps Autocomplete control. The plugin fixes some annoying layout bugs and provides extended functionality. View Website
Poly-Split
JavaScript
A Google Maps plugin that extends the polygon overlay with a new method to easily split it in two. Simply draw a polygon over another and then split out the difference. View Website
Sliding Puzzle
Gaming
An HTML5 game that randomly shuffles images into tiles. If you get stuck, you can watch the AI solve the puzzle in the shortest amount of steps. All images were created by Kelly N. Hagan. Play Game
The Frameshop
Website
The Frameshop is a family owned business specializing in custom framing. I worked closely with them to develop a brand new website with a responsive design. View Website
Simon Says
Gaming
Simon Says is a web based game that utilizes HTML5 features like data attributes, audio and local storage. Test your memory with this fresh take on a classic game. Play Game
gmaps.js
JavaScript
